#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define ff first
#define ss second
#define sz size()
#define all(a)  a.begin(), a.end()
#define allr(a) a.rbegin(), a.rend()
#define SL(n) scanf("%lld", &n)
#define fill(a, x) memset(a, x, sizeof(a));
#define mod 1000000007
#define eps 0.000000001

using namespace std;
typedef long long LL;
typedef vector <LL> VL;
typedef map <LL, LL> ML;
typedef pair<LL, LL> PL;
typedef vector <PL> VPL;

char S[10000005];
int main() {
    int T;
    cin >> T;
    int N;
    int x;
    while(T--){
        char K[10];
        int L = 0;
        scanf("%d%s", &N, K);
        int Ans = 0;
        for(int n=1;n<=N;++n){
            char temp[10];
            x = n;
            int l = 0;
            while(x){
                temp[l++] = (x % 10 + '0');
                x /= 10;
            }
            l--;
            while(l >= 0){
                S[L++] = temp[l];
                --l;
            }
            //cout << n << " : " << S << endl;
        }
        //cout << S << endl;
        int KL = strlen(K);
        int count = 0;
        for(int n=0;n<L;++n){
            count = 0;
            for(int j=n;j<L;++j){
                if(S[j] != K[count]){
                    break;
                }
                else{
                    count++;
                }
                if(count == KL){
                    Ans++;
                    break;
                }
            }
        }
        printf("%d\n", Ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
